file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: ZAC BFF
  version: 1.0.0
  description: Internal backend-for-frontend API documentation.
  contact:
    url: https://github.com/GemeenteUtrecht/zaakafhandelcomponent
  license:
    name: EUPL-1.2
paths:
  /api/_health/:
    get:
      operationId: _health_retrieve
      description: Geeft de gezondsheidscheckstatus terug.
      summary: Gezondheidscheck opvragen.
      tags:
      - _health
      requestBody:
        content: {}
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HealthCheck'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/access-requests:
    post:
      operationId: accounts_access_requests_create
      description: Access request for a particular zaak
      summary: Maak een toegangsverzoek aan.
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateAccessRequestRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateAccessRequestRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateAccessRequestRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '201':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateAccessRequest'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/access-requests/{id}:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_access_requests_retrieve
      description: Access request for a particular zaak
      summary: Alle toegangsverzoeken opvragen.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this access request.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccessRequestDetail'
          description: ''
    patch:
      operationId: accounts_access_requests_partial_update
      description: Access request for a particular zaak
      summary: Behandel een toegangsverzoek.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this access request.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedHandleAccessRequestRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedHandleAccessRequestRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedHandleAccessRequestRequest'
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HandleAccessRequest'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/auth-profiles:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_auth_profiles_list
      summary: Alle autorisatieprofielen opvragen.
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfile'
          description: ''
    post:
      operationId: accounts_auth_profiles_create
      summary: Maak een autorisatieprofiel aan.
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfileRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfileRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfileRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '201':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfile'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/auth-profiles/{uuid}:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_auth_profiles_retrieve
      summary: Een specifieke autorisatieprofiel opvragen.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: uuid
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfile'
          description: ''
    put:
      operationId: accounts_auth_profiles_update
      summary: Werk een autorisatieprofiel in zijn geheel bij.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: uuid
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfileRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfileRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfileRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthProfile'
          description: ''
    delete:
      operationId: accounts_auth_profiles_destroy
      summary: Verwijder autorisatieprofiel.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: uuid
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '204':
          description: No response body
  /api/accounts/cases/access:
    post:
      operationId: accounts_cases_access_create
      description: Create and delete an atomic permission for a particular user
      summary: Geef een atomisch recht aan een ZAAK.
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GrantPermissionRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GrantPermissionRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GrantPermissionRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '201':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/GrantPermission'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/cases/access/{id}:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_cases_access_retrieve
      description: Create and delete an atomic permission for a particular user
      summary: Alle atomische rechten opvragen.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this user atomic permission.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AtomicPermission'
          description: ''
    delete:
      operationId: accounts_cases_access_destroy
      description: Create and delete an atomic permission for a particular user
      summary: Verwijder een atomisch recht.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this user atomic permission.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '204':
          description: No response body
  /api/accounts/groups:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_groups_list
      summary: Alle gebruikersgroepen opvragen.
      parameters:
      - name: page
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A page number within the paginated result set.
        schema:
          type: integer
      - name: search
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A search term.
        schema:
          type: string
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      - tokenAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaginatedGroupList'
          description: ''
    post:
      operationId: accounts_groups_create
      summary: Maak een gebruikersgroep aan.
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroupRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroupRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroupRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      - tokenAuth: []
      responses:
        '201':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroup'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/groups/{id}:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_groups_retrieve
      summary: Een specifieke gebruikersgroep opvragen.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this groep.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      - tokenAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroup'
          description: ''
    put:
      operationId: accounts_groups_update
      summary: Werk een gebruikersgroep in zijn geheel bij.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this groep.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroupRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroupRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroupRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      - tokenAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ManageGroup'
          description: ''
    delete:
      operationId: accounts_groups_destroy
      summary: Verwijder een gebruikersgroep.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this groep.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      - tokenAuth: []
      responses:
        '204':
          description: No response body
  /api/accounts/logout:
    post:
      operationId: accounts_logout_create
      description: Meldt de huidige gebruiker af.
      summary: Meld gebruiker af.
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content: {}
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '204':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          description: No response body
  /api/accounts/permissions:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_permissions_list
      description: Geeft alle beschikbare rechten en hun beschrijving terug voor de
        gebruiker.
      summary: Alle rechten opvragen.
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Permission'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/roles:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_roles_list
      summary: Alle rollen opvragen.
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Role'
          description: ''
    post:
      operationId: accounts_roles_create
      summary: Maak een rol aan.
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '201':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Role'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/roles/{id}:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_roles_retrieve
      summary: Een specifieke rol opvragen.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this rol.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Role'
          description: ''
    put:
      operationId: accounts_roles_update
      summary: Werk een rol in zijn geheel bij.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this rol.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RoleRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:

        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Role'
          description: ''
    patch:
      operationId: accounts_roles_partial_update
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this rol.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedRoleRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedRoleRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedRoleRequest'
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Role'
          description: ''

      operationId: accounts_roles_destroy
      summary: Vernietig rol.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this rol.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '204':
          description: No response body
  /api/accounts/user-auth-profiles:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_user_auth_profiles_list
      summary: Alle gebruikersautorisatieprofielen opvragen.
      parameters:
      - name: ordering
        required: false
        in: query
        description: Which field to use when ordering the results.
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: page
        required: false
        in: query
        description: A page number within the paginated result set.
        schema:
          type: integer
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaginatedReadUserAuthorizationProfileList'
          description: ''
    post:
      operationId: accounts_user_auth_profiles_create
      summary: Maak een gebruikersautorisatieprofiel aan.
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserAuthorizationProfileRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:

          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserAuthorizationProfileRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '201':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserAuthorizationProfile'
          description: ''
  /api/accounts/user-auth-profiles/{id}:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_user_auth_profiles_retrieve
      summary: Een specifieke gebruikersautorisatieprofiel opvragen.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this user authorization profile.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReadUserAuthorizationProfile'
          description: ''
    put:
      operationId: accounts_user_auth_profiles_update
      summary: Werk een gebruikersautorisatieprofiel in zijn geheel bij.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this user authorization profile.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserAuthorizationProfileRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserAuthorizationProfileRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserAuthorizationProfileRequest'
        required: true
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserAuthorizationProfile'
          description: ''
    patch:
      operationId: accounts_user_auth_profiles_partial_update
      summary: Werk een gebruikersautorisatieprofiel bij.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this user authorization profile.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedUserAuthorizationProfileRequest'
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedUserAuthorizationProfileRequest'
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PatchedUserAuthorizationProfileRequest'
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Is-Hijacked:
              schema:
                type: string
                enum:
                - 'false'
                - 'true'
              description: Header displays als de gebruiker is gehijackt.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserAuthorizationProfile'
          description: ''
    delete:
      operationId: accounts_user_auth_profiles_destroy
      summary: Verwijder gebruikersautorisatieprofiel.
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
        schema:
          type: integer
        description: A unique integer value identifying this user authorization profile.
        required: true
      tags:
      - accounts
      security:
      - cookieAuth: []
      responses:
        '204':
          description: No response body
  /api/accounts/users:
    get:
      operationId: accounts_users_list
      summary: Alle gebruikersaccounts opvragen.
      parameters:
      - in: query
        name: exclude
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        description: Deprecated - please use 'exclude_username' instead.
        explode: false
        style: form
      - in: query
        name: exclude_email
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.
        explode: false
        style: form
      - in: query
        name: exclude_username
        schema:

components:
  schemas:
    AardRelatieOmgekeerdeRichtingEnum:
      enum:
      - vervolg
      - bijdrage
      - onderwerp
      type: string
      title: AardRelatieOmgekeerdeRichtingEnum
    AccessRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          readOnly: true
        requester:
          type: string
          description: '`username` van de toegangsvrager/gever'
      required:
      - id
      - requester
      title: AccessRequest
    AccessRequestDetail:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
          readOnly: true
        requester:
          type: string
          description: '`username` van de toegangsvrager/gever'
        handler:
          type: string
          readOnly: true
          description: '`username` van de toegangsbehandelaar/gever'
        zaak:
          allOf:
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ZaakShort'
          description: ZAAK waar toegang toe wordt gevraagd
        comment:
          type: string
          title: Toelichting
          description: Door aanvrager gegeven toelichting
          maxLength: 1000
        result:
          title: Resultaat
          description: Resultaat van het toegangsverzoek
          oneOf:
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResultEnum'
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlankEnum'
        requestedDate:
          type: string
          format: date
          title: Bevragingsdatum
          description: Datum wanneer het toegangsverzoek is aangemaakt
        handledDate:
          type: string
          format: date
          nullable: true
          title: Einddatum
          description: Datum wanneer het toegangsverzoek was behandeld
      required:
      - handler
      - requester
      - url
      - zaak
      title: AccessRequestDetail
    AddZaakDocumentRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        beschrijving:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
          description: Beschrijving van het DOCUMENT
        file:
          type: string
          format: binary
          description: Inhoud van het DOCUMENT. Elkaar uitsluitend met `url` attribuut
        informatieobjecttype:
          type: string
          format: uri
          minLength: 1
          description: URL-referentie naar het INFORMATIEOBJECTTYPE in de CATALOGI
            API. Vereist als `file` niet leeg is
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
